CheckTitle: Hotlink Protection is enabled to prevent bandwidth theft
Description: Verifies that Hotlink Protection (Scrape Shield) is enabled to prevent other websites from directly linking to images and media, consuming bandwidth without authorization.
Risk: Without Hotlink Protection, external websites can embed your images and media directly, consuming your bandwidth, increasing costs, and potentially using your content without attribution or permission.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Hotlink Protection to prevent unauthorized embedding of your media resources. Review allowed referrers if legitimate integrations require access to your hosted content.

Notes: Hotlink Protection blocks requests to images when the HTTP referer does not match your domain.
